title: No long, short-distance buses after 6.00 pm until Monday: SLTB
body_lines: The Sri Lanka Transport Board (SLTB) will only operate long and short distance bus services until 6.00 pm today, the SLTB Chairman said.
He said the buses would again resume their operation from 6.00 am on Monday (4 ) as usual. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
